analyzed: om namaḥ śivāya
niyati kṛta niyama rahitām hlāda eka mayīm ananya paratantrām
nava rasa rucitām nirmitim ādadhatī bhāratī kaveḥ jayati
kāvyam yaśase ṛtha kṛte vyavahāra vide śiva itara kṣataye
sadyas para nirvṛtaye kāntā saṃmita tayā upadeśa yuje
śaktiḥ nipuṇa tā loka śāstra kāvya ādi avekṣaṇāt
kāvya jña śikṣayā abhyāsaḥ iti hetuḥ tad udbhave
tad adoṣau śabda arthau sa guṇau analaṅkṛtī punar kvāpi
idam uttamam atiśayini vyaṅgye vācyāt dhvaniḥ budhaiḥ kathitaḥ
tu
śabda citram vācya citram avyaṅgyam tu avaram smṛtam
syāt vācakaḥ lākṣaṇikaḥ vyañjakaḥ tridhā
vācya ādayaḥ tad arthāḥ syuḥ tātparyārthaḥ pi keṣucid
sarveṣām prāyaśas rthānām vyañjaka tvam api iṣyate
sākṣāt saṃketitam yaḥ rtham abhidhatte sa vacakaḥ
saṅketitaḥ catur bhedaḥ jāti ādiḥ jātiḥ eva vā
sa mukhyaḥ rthaḥ tatra mukhyaḥ syā abhidhā ucyate
mukhya artha bādhe tad yoge rūḍhitaḥ tha prayojanāt

original: anyo 'rtho lakṣyate yatsā lakṣaṇāropitā kriyā // MKpr-K_9 //
analyzed: anyaḥ rthaḥ lakṣyate yat sā lakṣaṇa āropitā kriyā
sva asiddhaye parākṣepaḥ para artham sva samarpaṇam

original: upādānaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cetyuktā śuddhaiva sā dvidhā // MKpr-K_10 //
analyzed: upādānam lakṣaṇam ca iti uktā śuddhā eva sā dvidhā
sā āropā anyā tu yatra uktau viṣyī viṣayaḥ tathā
sā syāt sādhyavasānikā
bhedau imau ca sādṛśyāt sambandha antarataḥ tathā

original: gauṇau śuddhau ca vijñeyau lakṣaṇā tena ṣaḍvidhā // MKpr-K_12 //
analyzed: gauṇau śuddhau ca vijñeyau lakṣaṇā tena ṣaḍvidhā

original: vyaṅgyena rahitā rūḍhau sahitā tu prayojane /
analyzed: vyaṅgyena rahitā rūḍhau sahitā tu prayojane

original: tacca gūḍhamagūḍhaṃ vā tadeṣā kathitā tridhā // MKpr-K_13 //
analyzed: tat ca gūḍham agūḍham vā tat eṣā kathitā tridhā
tad bhū lakṣiṇikaḥ tatra vyāpāraḥ vyañjana ātmakaḥ
yasya pratītim ādhātum lakṣaṇā samupāsyate
phale śabda eka gamye vyañjanāt na aparā kriyā
na abhidhā samaya abhāvāt hetu abhāvāt na lakṣaṇā

original: lakṣyaṃ na mukhyaṃ nāpyatra bādho yogaḥ phalena no /
analyzed: lakṣyam na mukhyam na api atra bādhaḥ yogaḥ phalena no

original: na prayojanametasmin na ca śabdaḥ skhaladgatiḥ // MKpr-K_16 //
analyzed: na prayojanam etasmin na ca śabdaḥ skhalat gatiḥ
evam api anavasthā syāt yā mūla kṣaya kāriṇī

original: prayojanena sahitaṃ lakṣaṇīyaṃ na yujyate // MKpr-K_17 //
analyzed: prayojanena sahitam lakṣaṇīyam na yujyate
jñānasya viṣyaḥ hi anyaḥ phalam anyat udāhṛtam

original: viśiṣṭe lakṣaṇā naivaṃ viśeṣāḥ syustu lakṣite // MKpr-K_18 //
analyzed: viśiṣṭe lakṣaṇā nā evam viśeṣāḥ syuḥ tu lakṣite
aneka arthasya śabdasya vācaka tve niyantrite
saṃyoga ādyaiḥ avācya artha dhī kṛt vyāpṛtiḥ añjanam
tad yuktaḥ vyañjakaḥ śabdaḥ yat saḥ ṛtha antara yuj tathā
vyañjakaḥ tatra sahakāri tayā mataḥ
arthāḥ proktāḥ purā teṣām arhta vyañjaka tā ucyate
vaktṛ boddhavya kākūnām vākya vācya anya sannidheḥ
prastāva deśa kāla ādeḥ vaiśiṣṭyāt pratibhā juṣām
yaḥ rthasya anya artha dhī hetuḥ vyāpāraḥ vyaktiḥ eva sā
śabda pramāṇa vedyoḥ ṛthaḥ vyanakti artha antaram yatas
arthasya vyñjaka tve tad śabdasya sahakāri tā
avivakṣita vācya u taḥ tatra vācyam bhavet dhvanau
artha antare saṅkrimitam atyantam vā tiraskṛtam
vivakṣitam ca anya param vācyam yatra aparaḥ tu saḥ
pa a lakṣya krama vyañgyaḥ lakṣya vyaṅgya kramaḥ paraḥ
rasa bhāva tad ābhāva bhāva śānti ādiḥ akramaḥ
bhinnaḥ rasa ādi alaṅkārāt alaṅkārya tayā sthitaḥ
kāraṇāni atha kāryāṇi sahakārīṇi yāni ca

original: ratyādeḥ sthāyino loke tāni cennāṭyakāvyayoḥ // MKpr-K_27 //
analyzed: rati ādeḥ sthāyinaḥ loke tāni ced nāṭya kāvyayoḥ
vibhāvāḥ a bubhāvāḥ tat kathyante vyabhicāriṇaḥ

original: vyaktaḥ sa tairvibhāvādyaiḥ sthāyī bhāvo rasaḥ smṛtaḥ // MKpr-K_28 //
analyzed: vyaktaḥ sa taiḥ vibhāva ādyaiḥ sthāyī bhāvaḥ rasaḥ smṛtaḥ
sṛṅgāra hāsya karuṇa raudra vīra bhayānakāḥ

original: bībhatsādbhutasaṃjñau cetyaṣṭau nāṭye rasāḥ smṛtāḥ // MKpr-K_29 //
analyzed: bībhatsa adbhuta saṃjñau ca iti aṣṭau nāṭye rasāḥ smṛtāḥ
ratiḥ hāsaḥ ca śokaḥ ca krodha utsāhau bhayam tathā
jugupsā vismayaḥ ca iti sthāyibhāvāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
nirveda glāni śaṅkā ākhyāḥ tathā asūyā mada śramāḥ

original: ālasyaṃ caiva dainyaṃ ca cintā mohaḥ smṛtirdhṛtiḥ // MKpr-K_31 //
analyzed: ālasyam ca eva dainyam ca cintā mohaḥ smṛtiḥ dhṛtiḥ

original: vrīḍā capalatā harṣa āvego jaḍatā tathā /
analyzed: vrīḍā capala tā harṣaḥ āvegaḥ jaḍa tā tathā

original: garvo viṣāda autsukyaṃ nidrāpasmāra eva ca // MKpr-K_32 //
analyzed: garvaḥ viṣādaḥ autsukyam nidrā apasmāraḥ eva ca
suptam prabodhaḥ marṣaḥ ca api avahittham atha ugratā
matiḥ vyādhiḥ tathā unmādaḥ tathā maraṇam eva ca
trāsaḥ ca eva vitarkaḥ ca vijñeyāḥ vyabhicāriṇaḥ
triṃstriśat amī bhāvāḥ samākhyātāḥ tu nāmataḥ
nirveda sthāyibhāvaḥ sti navamaḥ rasaḥ
ratiḥ deva ādi viṣayā vyabhicārī tathā añjitaḥ
bhāvaḥ proktaḥ tad ābhāsāḥ anaucitya pravarttitāḥ

original: bhāvasya śāntirudayaḥ sandhiḥ śabalatā tathā // MKpr-K_36 //
analyzed: bhāvasya śāntiḥ udayaḥ sandhiḥ śabala tā tathā
mukhye rase teṅgi tvam prāpnuvanti kadācana
anusvāna ābha saṃlakṣya krama vyaṅgya sthitiḥ tu yaḥ
śabda artha ubhaya śakti utthaḥ tridhā sa kathitaḥ dhvaniḥ
vastu eva śabdāt yatra avabhāsate
pradhāna tvena sa jñeyaḥ śabda śakti udbhavaḥ dvidhā
artha śakti udbhavaḥ pi arthaḥ vyañjakaḥ saṃbhavī svatas
prauḍha ukti mātrāt siddhaḥ vā kaveḥ tena umbhitasya vā

original: vastu vālaṅkṛtirvety ṣaḍbhedo 'sau vyanakti yat // MKpr-K_40 //
analyzed: vastu vā alaṅkṛtiḥ vā iti sau vyanakti yat
vastu alaṅkāram athavā tena ayam dvādaśa ātmakaḥ
śabda artha ubhaya bhūḥ ekaḥ bhedāḥ aṣṭādaśā asya tat
rasa ādīnām ananta tvāt bhedaḥ ekaḥ hi gaṇyate
vākye dvyutthaḥ pade pi anye prabandhe pi artha śakti bhūḥ
pada eka deśa racanā varṇeṣu api rasa ādayaḥ
bhedāḥ tad eka pañcāśat teṣām ca anyonya yojane
saṃkareṇa tri rūpeṇa saṃsṛṣṭyā ca eka rūpayā
veda kha abdhi viyat candrāḥ śara iṣu yuga kha indavaḥ
agūḍham aparasya aṅgam vācya siddhi aṅgam sphuṭam
sandigdha tulya prādhānye kāku ākṣiptam asundaram
vyaṅgyam evam guṇībhūta vyaṅgyasya aṣṭau bhidāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: eṣāṃ bhedā yathāyogaṃ veditavyāśca pūrvavat // MKpr-K_46 //
analyzed: eṣām bhedāḥ yathāyogam veditavyāḥ ca pūrvavat
sa alaṅkāraiḥ dhvaneḥ taiḥ ca yogaḥ sa sṛṣṭi saṅkaraiḥ
anyonya yogāt evam syāt bheda saṃkhyā ati bhūyasī
śabda artha citram yat pūrvam kāvya dvayam udāhṛtam
guṇa prādhānyataḥ tatra sthitiḥ citra artha śabdayoḥ
mukhya artha hatiḥ doṣaḥ rasaḥ ca mukhyaḥ tad āśrayāt vācyaḥ

original: ubhayopayoginaḥ syuḥ śabdādyāstena teṣvapi saḥ // MKpr-K_49 //
analyzed: ubhaya upayoginaḥ syuḥ śabda ādyāḥ tena teṣu api saḥ
duṣṭam padam śruti kaṭu cyuta saṃskṛtya prayuktam asamartham
nihata artham anucita artham nirarthakam avācakam tridhā aślīlam
sandigdham apratitam grāmyam neya artham atha bhavet kliṣṭam
a vimṛṣṭa vidheya aṃśam viruddha mati kṛt samāsa gatam eva
apāsya cyuta saṃskāram asamartham nirarthakam

original: vākye 'pi doṣāḥ santyete padasyāṃśe 'pi kecana // MKpr-K_52 //
analyzed: vākye pi doṣāḥ santi ete padasya aṃśe pi kecana
pratikūla varṇam upahata lupta visargam visandhi hata vṛttam
nyūna adhika kathita padam patat prakarṣam samāpta punarāttam
ardha antara eka vācakam abhavat mata yogam anabhihita vācyam
a pada stha pada samāsam saṃkīrṇam garbhitam prasiddhi hatam
bhagna prakramam akramam amata parārtham ca vākyam eva tathā
artha upuṣṭaḥ kaṣṭaḥ vyāhata punarekta duṣkrama grāmyāḥ
saṃdigdhaḥ nirhetuḥ prasiddhi vidyā viruddhaḥ ca
anavīkṛtaḥ sa niyama aniyama viśeṣāḥ viśeṣa parivṛttāḥ
sākāṅkṣa upada yuktaḥ sahacara bhinnaḥ prakāśita viruddhaḥ
vidhi anuvāda ayukta tyakta punar svīkṛta uślīlaḥ
saṃnidhāna ādi bodha artham sthiteṣu etat samarthanam
khyāte rthe nirhetoḥ aduṣṭa tā anukraṇe tu sarveṣām
vaktra ādi aucitya vaśāt doṣaḥ pi guṇaḥ kvacid kvacid na ubhau
vyabhicāri rasa sthāyibhāvānām śabda vācya tā
kaṣṭa kalpanayā vyaktiḥ anubhāva vibhāvayoḥ
pratikūla vibhāva ādi grahaḥ dīptiḥ punar punar
akāṇḍe prathana chedau aṅgasya api ati vistṛtiḥ
aṅginoḥ anusaṃdhānam prakṛtīnām viparyayaḥ

original: anaṅgasyābhidhānaṃ ca rase doṣāḥ syurīdṛśāḥ // MKpr-K_62 //
analyzed: anaṅgasya abhidhānam ca rase doṣāḥ syuḥ īdṛśāḥ
na doṣaḥ sva padena uktau api saṃcāriṇaḥ kvacid
saṃcāri ādeḥ viruddhasya bādhyasya uktiḥ guṇa āvahā

original: āśrayaikye viruddho yaḥ sa kāryo bhinnasaṃśrayaḥ /
analyzed: āśraya aikye viruddhaḥ yaḥ sa kāryaḥ bhinna saṃśrayaḥ
rasa antareṇa antaritaḥ nairantaryeṇa yaḥ rasaḥ
smaryamāṇaḥ viruddhaḥ sāmyena atha vivakṣitaḥ

original: aṅginyaṅgatvamāptau yau tau na duṣṭau parasparam // MKpr-K_65 //
analyzed: aṅgini aṅga tvam āptau yau tau na duṣṭau parasparam
ye rasasya aṅginaḥ dharmāḥ śaurya ādayaḥ iva ātmanaḥ
utkarṣa hetavaḥ te syuḥ acala sthitayaḥ guṇāḥ
upakurvanti tam santam yeṅga dvāreṇa jātucit
hāra ādi vat alaṅkārāḥ tenaprāsa upama ādayaḥ
mādhurya ojaḥ prasāda ākhyāḥ trayaḥ te na punar daśa
āhlādaka tvam mādhuryam śṛṅgāre druti kāraṇam
karuṇe vipralambhe tat śānte ca atiśaya anvitam
dīpti ātma vistṛteḥ hetuḥ ojaḥ vīra rasa sthiti
bībhatsa raudra rasayoḥ tasya ādhikyam krameṇa ca
śuṣka indhana agni vat svaccha jala vat sahasā eva yaḥ
vyāpnoti anyat sau sarvatra vihita sthitiḥ
guṇa vṛttyā punar teṣām vṛttiḥ śabda arthayoḥ matā
kecid antar bhavat tyeṣu doṣa tyāgāt pare śritāḥ

original: anye bhajanti doṣatvaṃ kutracinna tato daśa // MKpr-K_72 //
analyzed: anye bhajanti doṣa tvam kutracid na tatas daśa

original: tena nārthaguṇā vācyāḥ proktāḥ śabdaguṇāśca ye /
analyzed: tena na artha guṇāḥ vācyāḥ proktāḥ śabda guṇāḥ ca ye

original: varṇāḥ samāso racanā teṣāṃ vyañjakatāmitāḥ // MKpr-K_73 //
analyzed: varṇāḥ samāsaḥ racanā teṣām vyañjaka tā mitāḥ

original: murdhni vargāntyagāḥ sparśā aṭavargā raṇau laghū /
analyzed: murdhni varga antya gāḥ sparśāḥ aṭa vargāḥ ra ṇau laghū
āvṛttiḥ madhya vṛttiḥ vā mādhurye ghaṭanā tathā
yoge ādya tṛtīya āmyām antyayoḥ reṇa tulyayoḥ

original: ṭādiḥ śaṣau vṛttidairghyaṃ gumpha uddhṛta ojasi // MKpr-K_75 //
analyzed: ṭādiḥ śa ṣau vṛtti dairghyam gumphaḥ uddhṛtaḥ ojasi
śruti mātreṇa śabdāt tu yena artha pratyayaḥ bhavet

original: sādhāraṇaḥ samagrāṇāṃ sa prasādo guṇo mataḥ // MKpr-K_76 //
analyzed: sādhāraṇaḥ samagrāṇām sa prasādaḥ guṇaḥ mataḥ
vaktṛ vācya prabandhānām aucityena kvacid kvacid
racanā vṛtti varṇānām anyathātvam api iṣyate
yat uktam anyathā vākyam anyathā anyena yojyate

original: śleṣeṇa kākvā vā jñeyā sā vaktroktistathā dvidhā // MKpr-K_78 //
analyzed: śleṣeṇa kākvā vā jñeyā sā vaktra uktiḥ tathā dvidhā
varṇa sāmyam anuprāsaḥ cheka vṛtti gataḥ dvidhā
saḥ na ikasya sakṛt pūrvaḥ ekasya api asakṛt paraḥ
mādhurya vyñjakaiḥ varṇaiḥ upanāgarikā ucyate
ojaḥ prakāśakaiḥ taiḥ tu paruṣā komalā paraiḥ
keṣāñcid etāḥ vaidarbhī pramukhāḥ rītayaḥ matāḥ
śābdaḥ tu lāṭānuprāsaḥ bhede tātparya mātrataḥ

original: padānāṃ saḥ padasyāpi vṛttāvanyatra tatra vā /
analyzed: padānām saḥ padasya api vṛttau anyatra tatra vā

original: nāmnaḥ sa vṛttyavṛttyośca tadevaṃ pañcadhā mataḥ // MKpr-K_82 //
analyzed: nāmnaḥ sa vṛtti avṛttyoḥ ca tat evam pañcadhā mataḥ

original: arthe satyarthabhinnānāṃ varṇānāṃ sā punaḥ śrutiḥ /
analyzed: arthe sati artha bhinnānām varṇānām sā punar śrutiḥ
yamakam pāda tad bhāga vṛtti tat yāti anekatām
vācya bhedena bhinnā tat yugapad bhāṣaṇa spṛśaḥ
śliṣyanti śabdāḥ śleṣaḥ usau akṣara ādibhiḥ aṣṭadhā
bheda abhāvāt prakṛti ādeḥ navamaḥ bhavet
tat citram yatra varṇānām khaḍga ādi ākṛti hetutā
punar ekta vat ābhāsaḥ vibhinna ākāra śabda gā
eka artha tā iva śabdasya tathā śabda arthayoḥ ayam

original: sādharmyamupamā bhede pūrṇā luptā ca sāgrimā /
analyzed: sādharmyam upamā bhede pūrṇā luptā ca sā agrimā

original: śrautyārthī ca bhavedvākye samāse taddhite tathā // MKpr-K_87 //
analyzed: śrautyā arthī ca bhavet vākye samāse taddhite tathā

original: tadvad dharmasya lope syānna śrautī taddhite punaḥ /
analyzed: tadvat dharmasya lope syāt na śrautī taddhite punar
upamāna an upādāne samāsa gā
va ādeḥ lope samāse sā karma ādhāra kyaci kyaṅi
karma kartrā ūrṇamulī etad dvi lope kvip samāsa gā
dharma upamānayoḥ lope vṛttau vākye ca dṛśyate

original: kyaci vādyupameyāse trilope ca samāsagā // MKpr-K_90 //
analyzed: kyaci vā ādi upamā iyāse tri lope ca samāsa gā
upamāna upameya tve ekasya eva eka vākya ge
ananvayaḥ viparyāsaḥ upameya upamā tayoḥ
saṃbhāvanam atha utprekṣā prakṛtasya samena yat

original: sasaṃdehastu bhedoktau tadanuktau ca saṃśayaḥ // MKpr-K_92 //
analyzed: sa saṃdehaḥ tu bheda uktau tad anuktau ca saṃśayaḥ
tat rūpakam abhedaḥ yaḥ upamāna upameyayoḥ
samasta vastu ciṣyam śrautāḥ āropitāḥ yadā
śrautāḥ ārthaḥ ca te yasmin eka deśa śa vivarti tat

original: sāṅgametan niraṅgaṃ tu śuddhaṃ mālā tu pūrvavat // MKpr-K_94 //
analyzed: sa aṅgam etat niraṅgam tu śuddham mālā tu pūrvavat
niyata āropaṇa upāyaḥ syāt āropaḥ parasya yaḥ

original: tatparaṃparitaṃ śliṣṭe vācake bhedabhāji vā // MKpr-K_95 //
analyzed: tad paraṃparitam śliṣṭe vācake bheda bhāji vā
prakṛtam yat niṣidhya anyat sādhyate sā tu apahnutiḥ

original: śleṣaḥ sa vākya ekasmin yatrānekārthatā bhavet // MKpr-K_96 //
analyzed: śleṣaḥ sa vākye ekasmin yatra aneka artha tā bhavet
para uktiḥ bhedakaiḥ śliṣṭaiḥ samāsoktiḥ nidarśanā
abhavan vastu saṃbandhaḥ upamā parikalpakaḥ
sva sva hetu anvayasya uktiḥ kriyayā eva ca sā aparā

original: aprastutapraśaṃsā yā sā saiva prastutāśrayā // MKpr-K_98 //
analyzed: aprastuta praśaṃsā yā sā sā eva prastuta āśrayā

original: kārye nimitte sāmānye viśeṣe prastute sati /
analyzed: kārye nimitte sāmānye viśeṣe prastute sati

original: tadanyasya vacastulye tulyasyeti ca pañcadhā // MKpr-K_99 //
analyzed: tad anyasya vacaḥ tulye tulyasya iti ca pañcadhā
nigīrya adhyavasānam tu prakṛtasya pareṇa yat

original: prastutasya yadanyatvaṃ yadyarthoktau ca kalpanam // MKpr-K_100 //
analyzed: prastutasya yat anya tvam yadi artha uktau ca kalpanam
kārya kāraṇayoḥ yaḥ ca paurvāparya viparyayaḥ

original: vijñeyātiśayoktiḥ sā prativastūpamā tu sā // MKpr-K_101 //
analyzed: vijñeyā atiśayoktiḥ sā prativastūpamā tu sā
sāmānyasya dvis ekasya yatra vākya dvaye sthitiḥ
dṛṣṭāntaḥ punar eteṣām sarveṣām pratibimbanam
sakṛt vṛttiḥ tu dharmasya prakṛta aprakṛta ātmanām

original: saiva kriyāsu bahvīṣu kārakasyeti dīpakam // MKpr-K_103 //
analyzed: sā eva kriyāsu bahvīṣu kārakasya iti dīpakam
mālādīpakam ādyam ca iti atha uttara guṇa āvaham
niyatānām sakṛt dharmaḥ sā punar tulya yogitā
upamānāt yat anyasya vyatirekaḥ saḥ eva saḥ
hetvoḥ kutau anuktīnām traye sāmye nivedite
śabda arthābhyām atha ākṣipte śliṣṭe tadvat tris aṣṭa tat
niṣedhaḥ vaktum iṣṭasya yaḥ viśeṣa abhidhitsayā
vakṣyamāṇa ukta viṣayaḥ saḥ ākṣepaḥ dvidhā mataḥ
kriyāyāḥ pratiṣedhe pi phala vyaktiḥ vibhāvanā
viśeṣa uktiḥ akhaṇḍeṣu kāraṇeṣu phala avacaḥ
yathāsaṃkhyam krameṇa eva kramikāṇām samanvayaḥ

original: sāmānyaṃ vā viśeṣo vā tadanyena samarthyate /
analyzed: sāmānyam vā viśeṣaḥ vā tad anyena samarthyate
yat tu saḥ ṛthāntaranyāsaḥ sādharmyeṇa itareṇa vā
virodhaḥ viruddha tvena yat vacaḥ
jātiḥ caturbhiḥ jāti ādyaiḥ viruddhā syāt guṇaiḥ tribhiḥ

original: kriyā dvābhyāmapi dravyaṃ dravyeṇaiveti te daśa /
analyzed: kriyā dvābhyām api dravyam dravyeṇa eva iti te daśa
svabhāva uktiḥ tu ḍimbha ādeḥ sva kriyā rūpa varṇanam
vyāja stutiḥ mukhe nindā stutiḥ vā rūḍhiḥ anyathā

original: sā sahoktiḥ sahārthasya balādekaṃ dvivācakam // MKpr-K_112 //
analyzed: sā sahoktiḥ saha arthasya balāt ekam dvi vācakam

original: vinoktiḥ sā binānyena yatrānyaḥ sanna netaraḥ /
analyzed: vinā uktiḥ sā binā anyena yatra anyaḥ san na na itaraḥ
parivṛttiḥ vinimayaḥ yaḥ rthānām syāt sama asamaiḥ
pratyakṣāḥ iva yat bhāvāḥ kriyante bhūta bhāvinaḥ
tat bhāvikam kāvya liṅgam hetoḥ vākya padārtha tā
paryāya uktam vinā vācya vācaka tvena yat vacaḥ

original: udāttaṃ vastunaḥ saṃpat mahatāṃ copalakṣaṇam // MKpr-K_115 //
analyzed: udāttam vastunaḥ saṃpad mahatām ca upalakṣaṇam
tad siddhi hetau ekasmin yatra anyat tad karam bhavet

original: samuccayo 'sau sa tvanyo yugapad yā guṇakriyāḥ // MKpr-K_116 //
analyzed: samuccayaḥ sau sa tu anyaḥ yugapad yāḥ guṇa kriyāḥ
ekam krameṇa anekasmin paryāyaḥ nyaḥ tatas nyathā
anumānam tat uktam yat sādhya sādhanayoḥ vacaḥ
viśeṣaṇaiḥ yat sākūtaiḥ uktiḥ parikaraḥ tu saḥ
vyāja uktiḥ chadmanā udbhinna vastu rūpa nigūhanam

original: kiñcit pṛṣṭamapṛṣṭaṃ vā kathitaṃ yat prakalpate /
analyzed: kiñcid pṛṣṭam apṛṣṭam vā kathitam yat prakalpate

original: tādṛganyavyapohāya parisaṃkhyā tu sā smṛtā // MKpr-K_119 //
analyzed: tādṛś anya vyapohāya parisaṃkhyā tu sā smṛtā
yathottaram ced pūrvasya pūrvasya arthasya hetu tā

original: tadā kāraṇamālā syāt kriyayā tu parasparam // MKpr-K_120 //
analyzed: tadā kāraṇa mālā syāt kriyayā tu parasparam
vastunoḥ janane nyonyam uttara śruti mātrataḥ

original: praśnasyonnayanaṃ yatra kriyate tatra vā sati // MKpr-K_121 //
analyzed: praśnasya unnayanam yatra kriyate tatra vā sati
asakṛt yat asaṃbhāvyam uttaram syāt tat uttaram
kutas lakṣitaḥ sūkṣmaḥ pi arthaḥ nyasmai prakāśyate

original: dharmeṇa kenacid yatra tat sūkṣmaṃ paricakṣate /
analyzed: dharmeṇa kenacid yatra tat sūkṣmam paricakṣate
uttarottaram utkarṣaḥ bhavet sāraḥ para avadhiḥ
bhinna deśa tayā atyantam kārya kāraṇa bhūtayoḥ
yugapad dharmayoḥ yatra khyātiḥ sā syāt asaṃgatiḥ
samādhiḥ sukaram kāryam kāraṇa antara yogataḥ

original: samaṃ yogyatayā yogo yadi saṃbhāvitaḥ kvacit // MKpr-K_125 //
analyzed: samam yogyatayā yogaḥ yadi saṃbhāvitaḥ kvacid
kvacid yat ati vaidharmyāt na śleṣaḥ ghaṭanām iyāt
kartuḥ kriyā phala avāptiḥ na evā anarthaḥ ca yat bhavet
guṇa kriyābhyām kāryasya kāraṇasya guṇa kriye

original: krameṇa ca viruddhe yat sa eṣa viṣamo mataḥ // MKpr-K_127 //
analyzed: krameṇa ca viruddhe yat saḥ eṣa viṣamaḥ mataḥ
mahatoḥ yat mahīyāṃsau āśrita āśrayayoḥ kramāt

original: āśrayāśrayiṇau syātāṃ tanutve 'pyadhikaṃ tu tat // MKpr-K_128 //
analyzed: āśraya āśrayiṇau syātām tanu tve pi adhikam tu tat
pratipakṣam aśaktena pratikartum tiraskriyā

original: yā tadīyasya tatstutyai pratyanīkaṃ taducyate // MKpr-K_129 //
analyzed: yā tadīyasya tad stutyai pratyanīkam tat ucyate
samena lakṣmaṇā vastu vastunā yat nigūhyate
nijena āgantunā vā api tat mīlitam iti smṛtam
sthāpyate ipohyate vā api yathāpūrvam param param

original: viśeṣaṇatayā yatra vastu saikāvalī dvidhā // MKpr-K_131 //
analyzed: viśeṣaṇa tayā yatra vastu sā eka āvalī dvidhā
yathānubhavam arthasya dṛṣṭe tad sadṛśe smṛtiḥ
smaraṇam bhrāntimān anya saṃvid tad tulya darśane
ākṣepaḥ upamānasya pratīpam upameya tā

original: tasyaiva yadi vā kalpyā tiraskāranibandhanam // MKpr-K_133 //
analyzed: tasya eva yadi vā kalpyā tiraskāra nibandhanam
prastutasya yat anyena guṇa sāmya vivakṣayā
aikātmyam badhyate yogāt tat sāmānyam iti smṛtam
vinā prasiddham ādhāram ādheyasya vyavasthitiḥ
eka ātmā yagapad dṛttiḥ ekasya aneka gocarā
anyat prakurvataḥ kāryam aśakyasya anya vastunaḥ

original: tathaiva karaṇaṃ ceti viśeṣastrividhaḥ smṛtaḥ // MKpr-K_136 //
analyzed: tathā eva karaṇam ca iti viśeṣaḥ trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ
svam utsṛjya guṇam yogāt ati ujjvala guṇasya yat

original: vastu tadguṇatāmeti bhaṇyate sa tu tadguṇaḥ // MKpr-K_137 //
analyzed: vastu tad guṇa tām eti bhaṇyate sa tu tad guṇaḥ
tad rūpa an anuhāraḥ ced asya tat syāt a tad guṇaḥ
yat yathā sādhitam kena api apareṇa tat anyathā

original: tathaiva yadvidhīyeta sa vyāghāta iti smṛtiḥ /
analyzed: tathā eva yat vidhīyeta sa vyāghātaḥ iti smṛtiḥ

original: seṣṭā saṃsṛṣṭireteṣāṃ bhedena yadiha sthitiḥ // MKpr-K_139 //
analyzed: sā iṣṭā saṃsṛṣṭiḥ eteṣām bhedena yat iha sthitiḥ
aviśrānti juṣām ātmani aṅga aṅgi tvam tu saṃkaraḥ
ekasya ca grahe nyāya doṣa abhāvāt aniścayaḥ
sphuṭam ekatra viṣaye śabda artha alaṅkṛti dvayam

original: vyavasthitaṃ ca tenāsau trirūpaḥ parikīrtitaḥ // MKpr-K_141 //
analyzed: vyavasthitam ca tena asau trirūpaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
eṣām doṣāḥ yathāyogam kecana
ukteṣu antarbhavanti iti na pṛthak pratipāditāḥ
iti kāvyaprakāśīya kārikāvalī samāptā
